first_para: Andrew Russell Bingham (born 23 June 1962) is a British Conservative Party politician. He has been Member of Parliament (MP) for High Peak in Derbyshire since winning the seat at the 2010 general election and Parliamentary Private Secretary to Minister of State for the Armed Forces Mark Francois MP since July 2014.

full.extract: Andrew Russell Bingham (born 23 June 1962) is a British Conservative Party politician. He has been Member of Parliament (MP) for High Peak in Derbyshire since winning the seat at the 2010 general election and Parliamentary Private Secretary to Minister of State for the Armed Forces Mark Francois MP since July 2014.
full.title: Andrew Bingham
